short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Email yourself links to sites you'd like to view later, in a single click!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
MEmail is a quick and easy way to send yourself links to recipes, articles, or job postings you want to read later. It sends the link in an email to the primary gmail account of the user signed into Chrome by default. 

To change your default email address, click the settings icon and enter your preferred email.
